## Content Calendar

### This Week
| Date | Platform | Band | Content Type | Topic/Theme | Status |
|------|----------|------|--------------|-------------|--------|
| [Date] | [Platform] | [Band] | [Photo/Video/Story/Reel] | [Description] | [Scheduled/Posted] |

### Content Ideas

#### Evergreen Content
- Behind-the-scenes rehearsal footage
- Drum cam videos (Fabi's perspective!)
- Guitar/bass playthroughs
- Song writing process
- Equipment tours
- "Day in the life" content

#### Timely Content
- Show announcements
- New music releases
- Show recaps with photos/videos
- Tour announcements
- Merch drops
- Collaborations with other bands

#### Engagement Content
- Q&A sessions
- Polls (next song to cover, etc.)
- Fan submitted content reshares
- Challenges or trends (metal style)
- Throwback content

---

## Posting Schedule

### Recommended Frequency
- **Instagram**: 3-4 posts/week + daily stories
- **Facebook**: 2-3 posts/week
- **TikTok**: 3-5 videos/week (algorithm loves consistency)
- **Twitter/X**: 1-2 posts/day (more casual, reactive)
- **YouTube**: 1-2 videos/month (quality over quantity)

### Best Times to Post
Track what works for your audience:
- [Platform]: [Days/Times that get best engagement]

---

## Growth Strategies

### Organic Growth
- [ ] Engage with other bands' content daily
- [ ] Use relevant hashtags (#metal #metalband #live music #[yourcity]metal)
- [ ] Collaborate with other local bands
- [ ] Post consistently
- [ ] Respond to all comments and DMs
- [ ] Share user-generated content

### Paid Promotion
- [ ] Budget: $[Amount]/month
- [ ] Focus: [Platform/Objective]
- [ ] Target audience: [Demographics/Interests]
- [ ] Track ROI on show tickets/merch

### Playlist Pitching
- [ ] Research relevant playlists
- [ ] Submit to Spotify editorial playlists
- [ ] Reach out to independent playlist curators
- [ ] Share music with metal blogs/channels

---

## Press & Media

### Press Kit Components
- [ ] High-res band photos
- [ ] Logo (various formats)
- [ ] Bio (short, medium, long)
- [ ] Press release template
- [ ] Links to music and videos
- [ ] Previous press coverage

### Media Contacts
| Outlet | Type | Contact | Last Contact | Status | Notes |
|--------|------|---------|--------------|--------|-------|
| [Blog/Mag/Podcast] | [Type] | [Email] | [Date] | [Submitted/Published] | [Notes] |

### Submission Targets
- [ ] Metal blogs
- [ ] Local alt-weekly publications

- [ ] Metal YouTube channels
- [ ] Online magazines

## SEO & Discoverability

### Website Keywords
- Band name variations
- Genre terms (metal, heavy metal, [subgenre])
- Location (for local search)
- Member names

### Profile Optimization
- [ ] Consistent band name across all platforms
- [ ] Complete all profile sections
- [ ] Add location tags
- [ ] Use keywords in bio
- [ ] Link all platforms together

## Campaign Templates

### New Single Release Campaign
**4 Weeks Out**:
- [ ] Teaser post (snippet, artwork reveal)
- [ ] Announce release date

**2 Weeks Out**:
- [ ] Pre-save campaign
- [ ] Behind-the-scenes content

**Release Week**:
- [ ] Countdown posts
- [ ] Lyric videos/visualizers
- [ ] Personal stories about the song

**Post-Release**:
- [ ] Thank fans
- [ ] Share fan reactions
- [ ] Submit to playlists

### Show Promotion Campaign
**Announcement**:
- [ ] Initial announcement with flyer
- [ ] Create/share Facebook event
- [ ] Story reminders

**Week Before**:
- [ ] Countdown posts
- [ ] "Who's coming?" engagement post
- [ ] Show details reminder

**Day Of**:
- [ ] "See you tonight" post
- [ ] Behind-the-scenes stories

**After Show**:
- [ ] Thank you post with photos
- [ ] Share fan content
- [ ] Next show announcement
